        • components
          java.util.Stack<Drawable> components
          All drawable components present on drawing panel TODO Not 100% confident that the stack is the right structure here -- it would be nice to let someone reorder the components to effectively set their Z-depth (which could technically be done with a stack, but is not really in the spirit of it all)
